title: Yummy Spinach Dip
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together chopped spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, green onions, dry vegetable dip mix, water chestnuts and prepared Dijon-style mustard. Chill in the refrigerator 8 hours, or overnight, before serving.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (1 ounce) package dry vegetable dip mix
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped
